extendedInfo.description: A live wallpaper displaying a colorful abstract and plasma effect.Lite/Free Version Features:- Full color 32bit scenes accelerated by 3D- Brightness setting- Looks great on Super AMOLED screens- Movement scene settings- Demo mode showing the other 9 scenes (Demo will start on first launch and accessible in the Wallpaper Settings)The Full Version Adds:- 10 different scenes including plasma effects- Scene timer that changes at the specified time range- Gesture support providing scene change by swiping downwards

reviews.comment: I like the colors, and being able to change it by swiping.Good!
